delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h4|color:%23000000" subtitle_font_options="tag:h4"]Has Your Wi-Fi Become Slow-Fi? Is It Time to Upgrade Your Home Office?[/dfd_heading][vc_column_text]Is your computer acting up?  Does it take way too long to load websites?  Is your hard drive so full it has slowed to a crawl when you search for a document?  Does your printer smear the edges?  Would you like to add a scanner so you can scan all those old bills and throw out the pile?  Or maybe you just are wondering if it is time to replace your cell phone.  To learn what to do to fix these problems, what’s new, and if it’s right for you, join our expert from ADX Computer Services, which specializes in helping seniors safely stay online.  There will be plenty of time for questions and answers.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row dfd_bg_style="image"][vc_column delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h4|color:%23000000" subtitle_font_options="tag:h4"]I'm Sorry, But You Do Need a Budget[/dfd_heading][vc_column_text]Budget, like diet, is a dirty word not to be discussed in mixed company.  Nevertheless, we’ll take a chance.  And while most people think of a budget as handcuffs, we’ll take a different approach.  You'll learn:[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" item.excerpt:encoded: Financial Education meeting information that focuses on the broad overview of basic individual investing in today's market.
